scripts.build: npm run build:wc:create && npm run build:wc:list && npm run build:wc:details
scripts.build:wc:details: ng build wc-prescription-details --configuration production --output-hashing none && vite build --mode production -c ./wc-prescription-details/vite.config.mjs && rm -rf ./dist/wc-prescription-details/browser && rm -f ./dist/wc-prescription-details/prerendered-routes.json && cp wc-prescription-details/package.json dist/wc-prescription-details/
scripts.build:wc:list: ng build wc-prescription-list --configuration production --output-hashing none && vite build --mode production -c wc-prescription-list/vite.config.mjs && rm -rf ./dist/wc-prescription-list/browser && rm -f ./dist/wc-prescription-list/prerendered-routes.json && cp wc-prescription-list/package.json dist/wc-prescription-list/
scripts.build:wc:create: ng build wc-prescription-create --configuration production --output-hashing none && vite build --mode production -c wc-prescription-create/vite.config.mjs && rm -rf ./dist/wc-prescription-create/browser && rm -f ./dist/wc-prescription-create/prerendered-routes.json && cp wc-prescription-create/package.json dist/wc-prescription-create/
scripts.build:mags-prescription-list: ng build mags-prescription-list-webcomponent --configuration production --output-hashing none && vite build --mode production -c ./wrappers/components/mags-prescription-list/vite.config.mjs && rollup -c ./wrappers/components/mags-prescription-list/rollup.config.dts.mjs
scripts.build:mags-prescription-details: ng build mags-prescription-details-webcomponent --configuration production --output-hashing none && vite build --mode production -c ./wrappers/components/mags-prescription-details/vite.config.mjs && rollup -c ./wrappers/components/mags-prescription-details/rollup.config.dts.mjs
scripts.test: npm run test:wc:details && npm run test:wc:create && npm run test:wc:list && npm run test:wc:reuse
scripts.test:coverage: npm run test:wc:details && npm run test:wc:create && npm run test:wc:list && npm run test:wc:reuse && npm run merge:coverage && npm run merge:report
scripts.generate-api: npx openapi-generator-cli generate -i api-contract/openapi.yaml -g typescript-angular -o reuse/code/openapi --additional-properties fileNaming=kebab-case,withInterfaces=true --generate-alias-as-model
scripts.generate-api:local: openapi-generator-cli generate -i api-contract/openapi.yaml -g typescript-angular -o reuse/code/openapi --additional-properties fileNaming=kebab-case,withInterfaces=true --generate-alias-as-model
scripts.generate-api:fromTools: java -jar tools/openapi-generator-cli.jar generate -i api-contract/openapi.yaml -g typescript-angular -o reuse/code/openapi --additional-properties fileNaming=kebab-case,withInterfaces=true --generate-alias-as-model
scripts.version: npm run generate-api:fromTools && npm run build
scripts.api:client:init: git submodule update --init --recursive && npx copyfiles -f ./lib/openapi-generator-cli/7.14.0/openapi-generator-cli-7.14.0.jar ./node_modules/@openapitools/openapi-generator-cli/versions/ && npm run generate-api:local
